name: Johnny Haze
description: I’m a man who loves to love, loves to give and loves to be part of my woman…I’m a man who will give all of me to the woman who touches my soul, becomes the prayer and the life of everything I would ever want…If it is meant to be, our hearts will find each other when we meet. And if our hearts melt together so will our bodies and souls. Then every word, every sound and every touch will fuel our passionate flame. I will be yours, you will be mine, and we will be one.
